bibl.title: Preliminary Report on the Excavations at Tell el-Farama (Pelusium). First two seasons (1983/4 and 1984/5).
bibl.note: 1. The Greco-Roman Thermal Bath. [Inscription on mosaic: "Eutuchos to ktiste".] - 2. The Roman Fortress.
Abd El-Maqsoud Mohamed, Preliminary Report on the Excavations at Tell el-Farama (Pelusium). First two seasons (1983/4 and 1984/5).
